scripts.prewatch: ls /config/www/community/ha-reef-card/ha-reef-card.js &> /dev/null; [ $? -ne 0 ] && mount -o loop /config/git/ha-reef-card/dist /config/www/community/ha-reef-card; kill -9 `ps |grep node|grep -v 'grep node' |head -n 1|sed s/'^[ ]*'// |cut -d ' ' -f 1` &> /dev/null;date;pwd;/config/git/ha-reef-card/scripts/update_supplements_list.sh
